verbs.description: To [V: understand] [ARG1: Donald Trump ’s real motivation in moving the U.S. embassy in Israel to Jerusalem] , just look at the pastors he had offering prayers at the opening of the new embassy . The benediction was delivered by Pastor John Hagee , who in the 1990s ...
